item.description:
Wei Qing lived for over twenty years and never saw such a crazy crossing.

She was a straight woman, crossed into a porn game she played years ago.

She wondered why the hell it was a modified version.

She nodded satisfactorily—she was a good child.

She grew somewhat drowsy…

——

The girl was completely naked; she straddled her waist.

item.title: Rebirth of the Excellent Daughter of the Marquis Household (REDMH)
item.nameextend: ***Letter from Kuizhou***
item.description:
Gu Yu Qi, a daughter born to a marquis household. She was beautiful with knowledge in both civil and military, and her kindness broader than the sky. It was love at first sight for her, and she insisted on marrying him and was happy even if she were to become a mistress. She worked hard to help him step by step to become the emperor.

But what happened to her in the end?

For ten whole years, she was humiliated and abandoned. Disheartened, she drank poison to end her life and set her place on fire, only to find herself back to when she was ten years old. It was the year she followed her mother into the capital. It wasn’t too late to change her fate.

If Yun Ke had any regrets in his previous life, then it would be how he always kept thinking about a woman who died decades ago. Because of that, before he died, he secretly had the woman’s ashes pressed beneath his coffin. As the emperor, he had the final say of everything under the sky. So how could he allow that woman to be arrogant in front of him? Even at his deathbed, he would crush her beneath him.

Who knew he’d be reborn again…

When the transmigrated girl meets the boy who was reborn, Gu Yu Qi simply wanted to yell at the sky. Just what are you playing at!?

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.nameextend: ***they say young master… died in Yizhou***
item.description:
At the princess’s banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face.

Their eyes met, and in each other’s gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair.
“I’ll go first…”
“I’ll head that way…”

However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princess’s maid and the second prince’s attendant searching for them not far away.
Helan Ci bit her lip: “What don’t you just go to the princess?”
Lu Wuyou endured: “I think the second prince is not bad either.”
Helan Ci: “If we keep talking, we’ll only end up hurting each other!”
Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: “Then let it be a mutual destruction.”
Helan Ci: “…?”

A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husband’s demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes.
Helan Ci asked, “…Can you handle this?”
Lu Wuyou replied, “Even if I can’t, I have to. Who told me to marry you— I’m going to be a powerful minister. I can’t fall here.”
Helan Ci, “Then do your best! I’m counting on you!”
Lu Wuyou, “…?”

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.

=====

Two chapters will be free every week (Sat & Sunday).

If you enjoy this story consider rate and review this at NovelUpdates, also support me at ko-fi

item.title: Little Fish and Mint
item.nameextend: ***Otherwise, others might think you're deliberately flirting***
item.description:
Xu Yitong had a cocky and pretentious younger cousin. Later, her cousin went pro in esports and “accidentally” provoked a famous player. Unfortunately, this player wasn’t easy to mess with, and his fans were even fiercer. Her cousin was chased all over the internet, thoroughly flamed and roasted.

Xu Yitong sighed, “What kind of people like him? Don’t they have enough homework to do?”

…

Later that night, Xu Yitong messaged her cousin:

[You’ll laugh, but it turns out I’m the kind of person who likes him : ) ]

[Don’t piss off my husband again, okay?]

“My preference for you is reflected in how I hate everything mint-related, yet you are my only Little Fish Mint.”

Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King

Tags: Love at First Sight, Lighthearted

Main Characters: Xu Yitong, Yu Ge

Other: Chatty Young Miss x Cold Aloof King

One-sentence Summary: And you are my only Little Fish Mint

Theme: You will always be my one and only

item.title: Within The Sound of Swallows
item.nameextend: ***Do Whatever Makes You Happy***
item.description:
At the tender age of five, Shen Guiyan could recite the Thousand Character Classic from memory; at the age of six, she could already play guqin and even composed her own melodies; at the age of seven, she could write a full poem and finish it in the brief time it took for the incense stick to burn; and by the time she turned eight, she was already betrothed to the son of the Prime Minister.

Everyone said that she was born with Phoenix Jade* in her mouth— destined for greatness from the very start.

However, fate took a cruel turn.

A woman from the modern era arrived and transformed Shen Guiyan’s once-brash younger sister into someone sharp and clever. She stole her fiancé, harmed her birth mother, and ruthlessly pulled her down from the heavens. Laughing arrogantly, she sneered, “How can a mere woman from the feudal era ever compete with a modern woman of the 21st century?”

Schemes and trickery altered her predestined fate, a pregnant belly destroyed her marriage prospects, and she was forced to marry a spoiled and troublemaking son of a noble, who brought ruin upon her on her supposed wedding night. And yet, by some strange twist of fate, it inadvertently led her to the most extraordinary encounter with her fated one.

A crazy monk once read her fortune: a great calamity at the coming of age, a great joy at the age of twenty, and a great sorrow in old age.

Shen Guiyan did not believe in fate. She only believed that with human determination, one could even overcome destiny.

Those who took from her, she would make sure they would pay! Those who harmed her, she would make sure they would burn in the pits of hell!

So what if you have traveled through time? So what if you have been reborn?

Even if you have eight or ten golden fingers**, I would chop them all up for you!

I would be coming for you, no matter what!

*born with Phoenix Jade in her mouth – this symbolizes a noble or auspicious birth, often implying destiny, luck, or even divine favor.

**golden fingers – Chinese slang for cheat-like powers, or supernatural advantages

item.title: Giving Interstellar Players a Horror Ghost Game Shock
item.description:
Ye Yuxi has lived in the interstellar world for 20 years and has just remembered that she is a proud transmigrator. Before her transmigration, she was an avid fan of horror games; after transmigrating, she coincidentally became a university student majoring in game design. In this interstellar world, where everyone is a tough, bloodthirsty warrior, violent and gory games are all the rage—most notably, games about hunting insectoid aliens and zombies. A search across the star network reveals no concept of supernatural horror games at all!

What does this mean? It means there is a vast untapped blue ocean of opportunity!

With this in mind, Ye Yuxi rolls up her sleeves and decides to give the interstellar residents a little shock with horror female ghost!

She launches Campus Nightmare, and interstellar players are terrified: “I’ve never been this scared of school!”

She releases Residential Area Battle Royale, and interstellar players cry: “This isn’t the battle royale I’ve played before!”

She rolls out A Loving Home, and interstellar players go crazy: “Where’s my quilt barrier? Is there any safe place in this world?!”

Later, after receiving the 10,086th complaint message from a terrified player, Ye Yuxi calmly accepts an interview: “At first, I just wanted to make a small game I’d enjoy. I never expected it to be so popular, so I ended up making a few more…”

Players who were scared out of their wits: “We thank you!”

If you’re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it at Dragonholic Discord server.

If you enjoy my translations and want to sprinkle a little joy in my cup, you can treat me to a coffee on Ko-fi or support me at Patreon! Your support means the world to me! ☕💖

Wei Qing calmed her mood and often looked at the obedient cute girl with loving eyes.

She nodded satisfactorily—she was a good child.

Wei Qing drank the water the girl handed her without caution.

She went to bed and felt especially sleepy today.

She grew somewhat drowsy…

——

Today’s dream… why was it especially real?

The girl was completely naked; she straddled her waist.

A beautiful young lady with no emotional intelligence vs. a gloomy, seductive, pitiful girl.

item.title: Within The Sound of Swallows
item.nameextend: ***A Man’s Dignity Lies in Knowing Shame***
item.description:
At the tender age of five, Shen Guiyan could recite the Thousand Character Classic from memory; at the age of six, she could already play guqin and even composed her own melodies; at the age of seven, she could write a full poem and finish it in the brief time it took for the incense stick to burn; and by the time she turned eight, she was already betrothed to the son of the Prime Minister.

Everyone said that she was born with Phoenix Jade* in her mouth— destined for greatness from the very start.

However, fate took a cruel turn.

A woman from the modern era arrived and transformed Shen Guiyan’s once-brash younger sister into someone sharp and clever. She stole her fiancé, harmed her birth mother, and ruthlessly pulled her down from the heavens. Laughing arrogantly, she sneered, “How can a mere woman from the feudal era ever compete with a modern woman of the 21st century?”

Schemes and trickery altered her predestined fate, a pregnant belly destroyed her marriage prospects, and she was forced to marry a spoiled and troublemaking son of a noble, who brought ruin upon her on her supposed wedding night. And yet, by some strange twist of fate, it inadvertently led her to the most extraordinary encounter with her fated one.

A crazy monk once read her fortune: a great calamity at the coming of age, a great joy at the age of twenty, and a great sorrow in old age.

Shen Guiyan did not believe in fate. She only believed that with human determination, one could even overcome destiny.

Those who took from her, she would make sure they would pay! Those who harmed her, she would make sure they would burn in the pits of hell!

So what if you have traveled through time? So what if you have been reborn?

Even if you have eight or ten golden fingers**, I would chop them all up for you!

I would be coming for you, no matter what!

*born with Phoenix Jade in her mouth – this symbolizes a noble or auspicious birth, often implying destiny, luck, or even divine favor.

**golden fingers – Chinese slang for cheat-like powers, or supernatural advantages

item.title: Rebirth of the Excellent Daughter of the Marquis Household (REDMH)
item.nameextend: ***This person was too cunning***
item.description:
Gu Yu Qi, a daughter born to a marquis household. She was beautiful with knowledge in both civil and military, and her kindness broader than the sky. It was love at first sight for her, and she insisted on marrying him and was happy even if she were to become a mistress. She worked hard to help him step by step to become the emperor.

But what happened to her in the end?

For ten whole years, she was humiliated and abandoned. Disheartened, she drank poison to end her life and set her place on fire, only to find herself back to when she was ten years old. It was the year she followed her mother into the capital. It wasn’t too late to change her fate.

If Yun Ke had any regrets in his previous life, then it would be how he always kept thinking about a woman who died decades ago. Because of that, before he died, he secretly had the woman’s ashes pressed beneath his coffin. As the emperor, he had the final say of everything under the sky. So how could he allow that woman to be arrogant in front of him? Even at his deathbed, he would crush her beneath him.

Who knew he’d be reborn again…

When the transmigrated girl meets the boy who was reborn, Gu Yu Qi simply wanted to yell at the sky. Just what are you playing at!?

item.title: The Eldest Legitimate Daughter is Both Beautiful and Valiant (ELDBBV)
item.nameextend: ***Forcing to kill Prince Xin***
item.description:
In the previous life, the Zhenguo Duke’s mansion collapsed and completely vanished. In this lifetime, Bai Qing Yan, the eldest legitimate daughter was reborn and she will never let the Bai family follow the same footsteps than in the previous life.

The sons of the Bai family are already dead, so is there no place for the Bai family to stand in the capital?

Xiao Rong Yan, a wealthy businessman from the Wei Kingdom said: “For hundreds of years, the Zhenguo Duke’s Bai family of military lineage, never produced any waste, and the family’s daughters are no exception.”

Later… the eldest miss of the Bai family was this generation’s goddess of war, legend had it that she had never been defeated.

The second miss of the Bai family was the resourceful matriarch at the newly appointed Zhongyong Marquis’ mansion.

The third miss of the Bai family is this world’s second richest merchant, a talent of the business world who can decide the rains and clouds.

Bai Qing Yan was grateful to Xiao Rong Yan for having helped her several times in the previous life, and secretly sent him information several times.

On a snowy night, they were blocked outside the city.

Xiao Rong Yan: Miss Bai saved me from fire and water again and again, is it that you admire me?

Bai Qing Yan said: Young Master Xiao has misunderstood.

Xiao Rong Yan: I saved Miss Bai from fire and water again and again, can Miss Bai admire me?

Bai Qing Yan: …
